title: Burkina Faso Harmonized Mining Production
description: Mining production in Burkina Faso increased 13 percent in March of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Mining Production in Burkina Faso averaged 10.29 percent from 2010 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 121 percent in the third quarter of 2016 and a record low of -43 percent in the third quarter of 2015. This page provides - Burkina Faso Mining Production- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: INSD - Institut National de la Statistique et de la Demographie
